metadata.description: Comprehensive Claude Code plugin marketplace featuring productivity commands (/quick-test, /analyze-deps, /project-stats), specialized code analysis agents (security-auditor, performance-optimizer, architecture-reviewer), and automatic code formatting hooks. Perfect for learning plugin development or extending your Claude Code workflow with production-ready examples.

plugins.name: productivity-commands
plugins.description: Collection of productivity-enhancing slash commands for common development workflows

plugins.name: code-analysis-agents
plugins.description: Specialized agents for code review, security analysis, and performance optimization

plugins.name: auto-formatter
plugins.description: Automatic code formatting hook that runs after file edits

plugins.name: fabric-helper
plugins.description: Fabric AI system integration with pattern suggestion and execution workflows

plugins.name: superclaude-framework
plugins.description: Complete SuperClaude Framework with behavioral rules, specialized agents, productivity commands, and MCP server integrations for enhanced Claude Code development

plugins.name: example-skills
plugins.description: Collection of example skills demonstrating various capabilities including skill creation, MCP building, webapp testing, makefile automation, Codex CLI, Fabric AI patterns, Gemini CLI, workflow orchestration, skill protocol mastery, subagent development, hooks mastery, and subagent configuration

plugins.name: custom-hooks
plugins.description: Custom UserPromptSubmit hook that adds AskUserQuestion reminder to all prompts

plugins.name: hook-workflow
plugins.description: Comprehensive workflow automation using Claude Code hooks for session management, code quality enforcement, security scanning, token tracking, and git validation

plugins.name: personal-ai-infrastructure
plugins.description: Complete Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI) platform with skills, agents, research capabilities, and automation workflows including Fabric patterns integration

plugins.name: claudekit-skills
plugins.description: ClaudeKit Skills - Complete plugin with 23 specialized skills, 5 slash commands (/use-mcp, /skill:create, /git:cm, /git:cp, /git:pr), and MCP manager agent. Covers authentication, AI/ML, web development, cloud platforms, databases, debugging, document processing (DOCX/PDF/PPTX/XLSX), and problem-solving frameworks

plugins.name: gitlab-tbc
plugins.description: Interactive guide for building GitLab CI/CD pipelines with to-be-continuous templates (conversational, step-by-step, real examples) and creating compatible components

plugins.name: skill-extractor
plugins.description: Extract reusable skills from Claude Code conversations using Fabric AI patterns. Transforms conversation history into well-structured SKILL.md files.

plugins.name: session-recorder
plugins.description: Records all Claude Code session interactions using a hybrid approach: automated hooks capture user messages and tool calls, while Claude self-reports summaries of completed work. Creates structured JSON logs for session analysis, debugging, and workflow auditing.

plugins.name: skill-activator
plugins.description: Increase Claude Code skill activation rates from 20% to 84% using forced evaluation hooks. Based on research by Scott Spence with 200+ test prompts.

author.name: Based on research by Scott Spence

plugins.name: fabric-skill
plugins.description: Native Fabric pattern execution for Claude Code. 227 AI patterns applied directly with full model power and conversation context - no CLI spawning needed.

plugins.name: prompt-improver
plugins.description: Intelligent prompt optimization using skill-based architecture. Enriches vague prompts with research-based clarifying questions before Claude Code executes them.

plugins.name: aws-skills
plugins.description: AWS development skills for Claude Code including CDK best practices, serverless architecture, cost optimization with MCP servers (pricing, cost explorer, cloudwatch), and Bedrock AgentCore for AI agent deployment
